    Methods in org.apache.zookeeper that return KeeperException
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static KeeperException
    KeeperException.create(int code)
    Deprecated.
    deprecated in 3.1.0, use create(Code) instead
    static KeeperException
    KeeperException.create(int code, String path)
    Deprecated.
    deprecated in 3.1.0, use create(Code, String) instead
    static KeeperException
    KeeperException.create(KeeperException.Code code)
    All non-specific keeper exceptions should be constructed via this factory method in order to guarantee consistency in error codes and such.
    static KeeperException
    KeeperException.create(KeeperException.Code code, String path)
    All non-specific keeper exceptions should be constructed via this factory method in order to guarantee consistency in error codes and such.
